definition: far/distant/remote/(intensifier in a comparison) by far/much (lower etc)

sentences.english: The remote search server is a single point of failure.
sentences.chinese: 遠程搜索服務器是一個單點故障點。

sentences.english: The iPATH Telemedicine Platform is an open-source software.
sentences.chinese: iPATH遠程醫療平臺是一種開源軟件。

sentences.english: Technology makes distance-education have more development space.
sentences.chinese: 技術使遠程教育有了更大的發展空間。

sentences.english: Contains settings to manage Remote Procedure Call troubleshooting .
sentences.chinese: 包含管理遠程過程調用疑難解答的設置。

sentences.english: The direct calculation method of precision conversion of long range antiship missile is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 探討了遠程反艦導彈精度摺合的直接推算方法。

sentences.english: We studied and implemented the data transmission protocol for remote data terminals.
sentences.chinese: 針對遠程數據終端的協議進行了研究與實現。

sentences.english: The advocates of tele-education give their arguments as follows.
sentences.chinese: 遠程教育的倡導者給出了他們的論點如下。

sentences.english: You would need to use this if you are posting data to the remote server.
sentences.chinese: 向遠程服務器發送數據時需要用到。

sentences.english: Gaming development for portables and remotely processing graphics - how possible this is?
sentences.chinese: 爲便攜式和遠程處理圖形如何可能這是遊戲開發？

sentences.english: Nowadays, more and more online school are providing e-learning courses.
sentences.chinese: 當今，越來越多的網絡學校提供遠程教學。

sentences.english: Grilled Sculpin now correctly grants Ranged Attack Power.
sentences.chinese: 烤肉飯桶現在正確的贈款遠程攻擊力。

sentences.english: As a result, electrocardiogram equipment with remote monitor ability becomes a trend.
sentences.chinese: 具有遠程監控功能的心電儀應運而生。

sentences.english: No authentication of the original caller occurs within the remote object host.
sentences.chinese: 在遠程對象主機中不對原調用者進行任何身份驗證。

sentences.english: In fact, the pattern contains the seeds of more than just hiding remoteness.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，該模式的作用遠不止隱藏遠程性。

sentences.english: The agentless approach is based on the collection of data using remote protocols.
sentences.chinese: 無代理方法基於使用遠程協議的數據收集。

definition: to spar/to fight/to duke it out
to recharge (a battery)/(fig.) to recharge one's batteries (through leisure)/to update one's skills and knowledge
to go online/to put sth online
